conbody.p: The Report Outline lists all sections which will be included in your Query report. Sections can be added and removed following instructions in .

li.p: Output a text comment in the report.
Output the list of parameters and values used in the query.
Output session names and number of results for each Result Set.
Output a table of result values and the number of times they appear in all selected Result Sets.
Add a new section with one or more report elements for each individual Result Set.

conbody.p: When you add a new section to the Report Outline, you may add several subsections to it (each subsection will be printed for each individual Result Set):

li.p: Output a text comment for every Result Set in the report.
Output a count of distinct result values for a Result Set.
Output the data for each result in a Result Set as a table or a list.
Add a new subsection to the report.
